IDS.name: gyrokinetics
IDS.documentation: Description of a gyrokinetic simulation (delta-f, flux-tube). All quantities within this IDS are normalised (apart from time and from the normalizing quantities structure), thus independent of rhostar, consistently with the local approximation and a spectral representation is assumed in the perpendicular plane (i.e. homogeneous turbulence).

field.name: ids_properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any comment describing the content of this IDS

field.name: homogeneous_time
field.documentation: This node must be filled (with 0, 1, or 2) for the IDS to be valid. If 1, the time of this IDS is homogeneous, i.e. the time values for this IDS are stored in the time node just below the root of this IDS. If 0, the time values are stored in the various time fields at lower levels in the tree. In the case only constant or static nodes are filled within the IDS, homogeneous_time must be set to 2

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the data (any comment describing the origin of the data : code, path to diagnostic signals, processing method, ...). Superseeded by the new provenance structure.

field.name: provider
field.documentation: Name of the person in charge of producing this data

field.name: creation_date
field.documentation: Date at which this data has been produced

field.name: version_put
field.documentation: Version of the access layer package used to PUT this IDS

field.name: data_dictionary
field.documentation: Version of Data Dictionary used to PUT this IDS

field.name: access_layer
field.documentation: Version of Access Layer used to PUT this IDS

field.name: access_layer_language
field.documentation: Programming language of the Access Layer high level API used to PUT this IDS

field.name: provenance
field.documentation: Provenance information about this IDS

field.name: node
field.documentation: Set of IDS nodes for which the provenance is given. The provenance information applies to the whole structure below the IDS node. For documenting provenance information for the whole IDS, set the size of this array of structure to 1 and leave the child "path" node empty

field.name: path
field.documentation: Path of the node within the IDS, following the syntax given in the link below. If empty, means the provenance information applies to the whole IDS.

field.name: sources
field.documentation: List of sources used to import or calculate this node, identified as explained below. In case the node is the result of of a calculation / data processing, the source is an input to the process described in the "code" structure at the root of the IDS. The source can be an IDS (identified by a URI or a persitent identifier, see syntax in the link below) or non-IDS data imported directly from an non-IMAS database (identified by the command used to import the source, or the persistent identifier of the data source). Often data are obtained by a chain of processes, however only the last process input are recorded here. The full chain of provenance has then to be reconstructed recursively from the provenance information contained in the data sources.

field.name: wavevector
field.documentation: Set of wavevectors

field.name: radial_component_norm
field.documentation: Normalised radial component of the wavevector

field.name: radial_component_norm_error_upper
field.documentation: Upper error for "radial_component_norm"

field.name: radial_component_norm_error_lower
field.documentation: Lower error for "radial_component_norm"

field.name: radial_component_norm_error_index
field.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "radial_component_norm"

field.name: eigenmode
field.documentation: Set of eigenmode for this wavector

field.name: growth_rate_norm
field.documentation: Growth rate

field.name: growth_rate_norm_error_upper
field.documentation: Upper error for "growth_rate_norm"

field.name: growth_rate_norm_error_lower
field.documentation: Lower error for "growth_rate_norm"

field.name: growth_rate_norm_error_index
field.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "growth_rate_norm"

field.name: frequency_norm_error_upper
field.documentation: Upper error for "frequency_norm"

field.name: frequency_norm_error_lower
field.documentation: Lower error for "frequency_norm"

field.name: frequency_norm_error_index
field.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "frequency_norm"

field.name: growth_rate_tolerance
field.documentation: Relative tolerance on the growth rate (convergence of the simulation)

field.name: poloidal_angle
field.documentation: Poloidal angle grid (see detailed documentation at the root of the IDS)

field.name: poloidal_angle_error_upper
field.documentation: Upper error for "poloidal_angle"

field.name: poloidal_angle_error_lower
field.documentation: Lower error for "poloidal_angle"

field.name: poloidal_angle_error_index
field.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "poloidal_angle"

field.name: phi_potential_perturbed_norm
field.documentation: Normalised perturbed electrostatic potential

field.name: phi_potential_perturbed_norm_error_upper
field.documentation: Upper error for "phi_potential_perturbed_norm"

field.name: phi_potential_perturbed_norm_error_lower
field.documentation: Lower error for "phi_potential_perturbed_norm"

field.name: phi_potential_perturbed_norm_error_index
field.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "phi_potential_perturbed_norm"

field.name: time_norm
field.documentation: Normalised time of the gyrokinetic simulation

field.name: time_norm_error_upper
field.documentation: Upper error for "time_norm"

field.name: time_norm_error_lower
field.documentation: Lower error for "time_norm"

field.name: time_norm_error_index
field.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "time_norm"
